title: Prompt Generation History
description: Generate optimized AI prompts based on historical sessions to improve development efficiency

step1.title: 1. Describe Goal
step1.description: Clearly describe the task you want to complete, be as specific as possible

step2.title: 2. AI Analysis
step2.description: The system will retrieve relevant historical sessions and analyze best practices

step3.title: 3. Generate Prompt
step3.description: Get structured, optimized prompts ready for AI programming assistants

step4.title: 4. Copy & Use
step4.description: One-click copy or save to prompt library for later use

history.title: History
history.description: View all your generated prompt history
history.noHistoryHint: Generated prompts will be automatically saved here
history.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this history record? This action cannot be undone.
